Description:
Relevant experience in Foods Manufacturing Plant (Facilities Management)
Experience in Food and Restaurant business, Property Management, Contracting Services etc.
Related educational qualification in engineering, MEP, Electromechanical, or management studies.
Related health and safety management qualification.
Good organizational, leadership, or management skills
Good verbal and written communication skills
Problem solving and decision making ability
Good computer skills - PowerPoint, Excel, Word, Auto CADD, etc.
Ability to manage a mixed and complex workload
Good contractor management skills.
Hands-on technical skills.
Good and experienced in team supervision and work delegation.
Willing to work under pressure, in extended working hours, and working with a team.Job Details
